title: Stop giving me leaver buster
body:
I have posted, multiple times ,on different boards for help, I randomly receive games with 1000 ping for the first 10 minutes, that I sometimes will have for the entire game, so I leave and the game remakes. I DONT KNOW HOW TO FIX THIS, NOBODY RESPONDS, WHY DO I HAVE AN AVERAGE OF 130 PING FOR 5 GAMES AND THE SIXTH WILL GIVE ME 1000? WHY?

I have seen multiple others with the same issue on the boards and one close friend. If your not gonna put something out their to help then don't give me a fucking 20 minute leaver buster.

replies.body: This is likely to not be a Riot issue, especially if no one else in your game is having similar issues -- their servers to have the occasional hiccup, but nothing on that scale with that reliability. I would recommend looking into other network use, and possibly running a trace route command to Riot's network to see where your issues are -- my suspicion is that the issue isn't at their end, but it might not be at yours either.

>
>  running a trace route command to Riot's network to see where your issues are

Thanks ill try it out.

you probably should sumbit to https://support.riotgames.com and ask for technical support.

I've had a friend who've had similar issues before. He called the ISP and they sent a technician and found that there were staples in the cable. Once they fixed that, smooth ride for him.

if you have roommates or family sharing the web some programs can take priority.  in my experience YouTube, Face time, Twitch, Netflix, Xbox, phone games and any download are all bandwidth hogs. either have a direct connection or learn about port forwarding and the limits to the services you have .
You can probably send a ticket in to riot support and im sure someone will be glad to help walk you through troubleahooting issues.

Stop leaving?

Run a check on your network before playing if you cant guarantee it is working.

It is not RIOT's issue. I will be willing to bet you are playing on WiFi which will answer the ping question. 

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/ethernet-vs-wifi-ping-packets-playing-better

Don't give me the I can't use ethernet because I have two 50 footers and a splicer if needed. I'm sorry but gaming on Wifi is not very smart to do in this game when sudden lag could really screw you over. Those lucky enough to have good Wifi won't see as many spikes but trust me, they will from time to time and if they tell you they don't then they are full of shit.

Plug in and most of your issues will go away.
Im playing on a laptop as my PC is getting fixed, I should get it back in a couple days but the tech guys are being lazy fucks. Thanks, If this doesn't help me it should help my friend out.
